Supplier ID

Supplier Reference ID. The Supplier Reference ID can be used to uniquely identify a Supplier  Unlike Supplier ID, Workday will not automatically generate a Supplier Reference ID if one is not received.  The recommended use for Supplier Reference ID is where the Workday is not the source system of the Supplier

Submit for Approval is a boolean flag indicating if the Supplier is to be submitted or saved in draft mode. If this flag is set, the Supplier will be submitted, otherwise the Supplier is saved in draft. Default to 1 if the Submit flag does not exist in the request.

Do_not_pay_during_Bank_Account_updates.description: Flag to indicate not to pay while Settlement Bank Account changes are in progress. Exclude Supplier Invoices from Settlement.

Document_Link.description: The Document Link URL entered does not comply with URL restrictions set for this Field.

Exclude_Tax_Amount_from_Supplier_Invoice.description: Set to true to indicate that you want to exclude Tax Amount from the supplier invoice discount calculation.
